CustomField.description: Calculation of Discount Percentage based on Sales Price ARR/One-Off and Default Price ARR/One-Off
CustomField.formula: IF( Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c = 0, 0, IF( Sales_Price_ARR_One_off__c > Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c, 0, ( Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c - Sales_Price_ARR_One_off__c) / Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c))
CustomField.label: Discount (%)
